metadata.Title: CVE-2021-35196 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** Manuskript through 0.12.0 allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code via a crafted settings.pickle file in a project file,because there is insecure deserialization via the pickle.load() function insettings.py. NOTE: the vendor's position is that the product is notintended for opening an untrusted project file.

criterions.comment: manuskript package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
